summary: An ordinance relating to the Engineering Dept.; providing for the completion of plans, specifications and cost estimates for and the construction of decorative sidewalks, and decorative street paving, the planting of street trees and the placing of street furniture on Occidental Ave. South from South Washington Street to Yesler Way and the construction of a decorative sidewalk on Yesler Way, south side only, from Occidental Ave. South to a point approximately 111 feet east thereof, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
